debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: Second Stage
Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to secure the Provision of free period products.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun soláthar táirgí míosta saor in aisce a áirithiú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Tháirgí Míosta a Sholáthar Saor in Aisce, 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the sale of consumer goods packaging containing harmful plastics, to prohibit the sale of consumer products containing microbeads, to promote the use of biodegradable materials in the packaging of consumer products, to enable the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and Environment to make for that purpose certain regulations and to permit the Environmental Protection Agency to prepare programmes for monitoring the use of harmful plastics in the manufacture, distribution and sale of consumer products in the State.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc pacáistiú earraí tomhaltais, ar pacáistiú é ina bhfuil plaistigh dhochracha, a dhíol, do thoirmeasc táirgí tomhaltais ina bhfuil micreachlocha a dhíol, do chur úsáid ábhar in-bhithdhíghrádaithe chun cinn sa phacáistiú ar tháirgí tomhaltais, do chumasú don Aire Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son na hAeráide agus Comhshaoil rialacháin áirithe a dhéanamh chun na críche sin, agus do thabhairt cead don Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil cláir a ullmhú chun faireachán a dhéanamh ar úsáid plaisteach dochrach le linn táirgí tomhaltais a mhonarú, a dháileadh agus a dhíol sa Stát.

debates.showAs: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009, Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 and subsequent regulations to reduce social housing and housing assistance payment scheme assessment times.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2009, Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2014 agus rialacháin dá éis sin chun na tréimhsí measúnachta a laghdú maidir le tithíocht shóisialta agus maidir leis an scéim um íocaíocht cúnaimh tithíochta.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Tréimhsí Feithimh maidir le hÍocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Committee Stage
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a mandatory prison sentence in respect of an assault on a member of the emergency services; to provide for the introduction of an offence of ramming an emergency services vehicle and to provide for a mandatory prison sentence in respect of such an offence, and for that purpose to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pianbhreith phríosúnachta shainordaitheach i leith ionsaí ar chomhalta de na seirbhísí éigeandála; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion a thabhairt isteach arb éard é feithicil de chuid na seirbhísí éigeandála a sháinniú agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pianbhreith phríosúnachta shainordaitheach i leith cion den sórt sin, agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: Restoration to Order Paper

bill.longTitleEn: for the purposes of making further and better provision for the care and protection of adults who are at risk; to establish the National Adult Safeguarding Authority; to require certain persons to make reports to the National Adult Safeguarding Authority in respect of adults at risk of abuse or harm in certain circumstances; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun socrú breise agus feabhsaithe a dhéanamh chun cúram agus cosaint a thabhairt d'aosaigh atá i mbaol; chun an t-Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach a bhunú; dá cheangal ar dhaoine áirithe tuarascálacha a thabhairt don Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach maidir le haosaigh atá i mbaol drochúsáide nó dochair in imthosca áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aosaigh a Chosaint, 2017

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create the indictable offence of corporate manslaughter by an undertaking, to create the indictable offence of grossly negligent management causing death by a high managerial agent of the undertaking, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é dúnorgain chorparáideach ag gnóthas, do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é bainistiú mórfhaillíoch ag gníomhaire is ardbhainisteoir de chuid an ghnóthais, ar bainistiú mórfhaillíoch é is cúis le bás, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Registration of Wills Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Restoration to Order Paper
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: Committee and Remaining Stages
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: Second Stage
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the extension of the civil registration service to the registration of certain information regarding wills and for those purposes to revise the law relating to the civil registration service and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta a leathnú chuig clárú faisnéise áirithe maidir le huachtanna agus chun na gcríoch sin d'athmheas an dlí a bhaineann leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
